title.narrative: Scalable Low-Cost Mobile Technology for Civil Society Organizations

description.narrative: Social Impact lab will create and host a series of web-based trainings to support 35 civil society organizations in their efforts to use mobile technology to broaden citizen participation in democratic processes. Based on our years of training experience, we will develop an innovative guided curriculum aimed at exploring applications of mobile technology for accessing information and monitoring civic engagement, as well as outlining challenges in the use of technology to engage members of society. We will also develop an online resource toolkit aimed at improving mobile engagement efforts for civil society organizations all over the world. ;

activity-date.narrative: The grant runs from Dec 2013 through Fall 2015. Planning for the first pilot course occurred through Spring and Summer 2014. The first pilot course took place during Fall 2014 followed by additional course through Spring and Summer 2015.
